item.title: Pizza Hut closing 250 US stores as parent company considers selling the brand
item.description: Pizza Hut plans to close 250 U.S. restaurants in the first half of this year as its parent company considers a sale of the chain

item.title: Hims & Hers launches copy of Wegovy pill, prompting legal threats from drugmaker Novo Nordisk
item.description: Telehealth company Hims & Hers is launching a cheaper, off-brand version of the blockbuster weight loss pill Wegovy

item.title: Companies can now claim 'no artificial colors' if they add plant-based color to food
item.description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration is relaxing rules that restrict when food companies can claim their products have no artificial colors

item.title: Average US long-term mortgage rate barely budges, holding near 6%
item.description: The average long-term U.S. mortgage rate barely budged this week, staying close to 6% as the spring homebuying season nears

item.title: Boar's Head deli meat plant tied to deadly food-poisoning outbreak reopens
item.description: Company and federal officials said the Boar's Head deli meat plant tied to a deadly 2024 listeria food poisoning outbreak is back in business
